snippet: Some investment professionals are competing to turn the gem into a commodity that would become available to investors in exchange-traded funds the way gold has in recent years.
abstract: Some investment professionals are competing to turn diamonds into a commodity that would be available to investors in exchange-traded funds in a manner similar to gold; Securities and Exchange Commission is reviewing a proposal to create a fund that would allow investors to buy one-carat diamonds and store them in a vault, providing daily values with an as-yet-unnamed index.
lead_paragraph: Some investment professionals are competing to turn the gem into a commodity that would become available to investors in exchange-traded funds the way gold has in recent years.

headline.seo: Turning Diamonds Into a Commodity to Be Traded
